title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6030.5 - Replacement of vests
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6030.5 - Replacement of vests

State Regulations
(a) Any vest damaged or destroyed due to use in service, improper laundering, abuse
or any other reason shall be removed from service and replaced with an
appropriate vest. (b) Any vest
which sustains one hit from a firearm shall be considered a damaged
vest. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
6030.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
